articleThumbQuerySQL: select count(*) as count from article_thumb where article_id='<%= article_id %>'
articleThumbFlagSQL: select count(*) as count from article_thumb where user_id='<%= user_id %>' and article_id='<%= article_id %>'
articleThumbSQL: insert into article_thumb (user_id, article_id) values('<%= user_id %>','<%= article_id %>')
articleThumbCancelSQL: delete from article_thumb where user_id='<%= user_id %>' and article_id='<%= article_id %>'
